üîí Privacy Policy

Last Updated: February 2026

1. Introduction

Welcome to the Baloch Culture Platform ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our website. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information.

2. Information We Collect

We collect information in the following ways:

  • Automatic Information: When you visit our site, we automatically collect certain information about your device and browsing behavior, including IP address, browser type, referring URL, pages visited, and the time spent on each page.
  • Cookies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze site usage.
  • Form Submissions: When you submit a form (e.g., collaboration, feedback, or gameplay submissions), we collect the information you provide.
  • Third-Party Data: Our advertising partners may collect data about your interactions with ads on our site.

3. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Improve and personalize your experience on our website
  • Display targeted advertisements through Google AdSense and other advertising partners
  • Analyze website performance and user behavior
  • Respond to your inquiries and feedback
  • Maintain the security and functionality of our site
  • Comply with legal obligations

4. Google AdSense & Advertising

This website uses Google AdSense to display personalized advertisements. Google AdSense may collect and process data about your browsing behavior to deliver targeted ads. This includes:

  • Google Cookies: Google uses cookies to track your activity across websites.
  • Advertising ID: Your unique advertising identifier may be collected.
  • Interest Categories: Google may categorize your interests based on your browsing history.

You can opt out of personalized advertising by visiting the Google Account settings or the Network Advertising Initiative opt-out page.

5. Third-Party Advertisers

Third-party advertisers (including Google and others) may display ads on our website. These companies may:

  • Use cookies and similar technologies to collect browsing data
  • Show ads based on your interests and activity
  • Implement their own privacy policies

We do not control the practices of third-party advertisers. We encourage you to review their privacy policies for more information.

6. Cookies & Tracking Technologies

We use cookies and similar technologies to:

  • Remember your preferences and settings
  • Understand how you use our website
  • Deliver personalized content and advertisements
  • Measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns

You can control cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse cookies or alert you when cookies are being sent. However, blocking cookies may affect your experience on our website.

7. Children's Privacy

Our website is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will delete such information immediately and terminate the child's account if applicable. Parents or guardians who believe their child has provided information to our site should contact us immediately.

8. User Consent & Data Processing

By using our website, you consent to:

  • Collection of automatically generated information (IP address, cookies, device data)
  • Processing of information for advertising purposes
  • Sharing of data with third-party advertising partners
  • Our privacy and data handling practices as outlined in this policy

If you do not consent to these practices, please do not use our website.

9. Data Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security of your information.

10. Data Retention

We retain your information as follows:

  • Cookies: Retained according to your browser settings or until explicitly cleared
  • Form Submissions: Retained indefinitely for community and administrative purposes
  • Server Logs: Typically retained for 30 days
  • Advertising Data: Managed by our advertising partners according to their retention policies

11. Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

  • Right to Access: Request a copy of the data we hold about you
  • Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal requirements)
  • Right to Opt-Out: Opt out of certain data collection and advertising practices
  • Right to Portability: Request your data in a portable format

To exercise these rights, please contact us at the information provided below.

12. No Personal Data Collection Without Purpose

We do NOT collect:

  • Sensitive personal information (health, financial data, SSN, etc.) except as voluntarily provided
  • Information about minors under 13 for marketing purposes
  • Location data beyond what is necessary

We collect only the information necessary to provide our services and display relevant advertising.

13. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of significant changes by updating the "Last Updated" date on this page. Your continued use of the website after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.

14. Contact Us

If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

Email: privacy@balochculture.com

Website: Baloch Culture Platform

15. Legal Notice

This Privacy Policy is compliant with:

  • Google AdSense Program Policies
  • GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) requirements
  • CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act) principles
  • Industry best practices for user privacy

Thank you for trusting us with your privacy. We're committed to maintaining the highest standards of data protection.
